messages.msgSnippet: Will do. Thanks for the invite. zenmomma@comcast.net wrote:                               I m starting a new playgroup in the Eugene, OR area Hey Melissa I
messages.messageBody:
Will do. Thanks for the invite.

zenmomma@... wrote: >>I'm starting a new playgroup in the Eugene, OR area>>

Hey Melissa I didn't know that you are in Eugene. I'm up in Corvallis. My group has a park day every Wednesday. We'd love to have you join us if you're ever in the area.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/CorvallisTLC/?yguid=218449772

--
~Mary
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: ASD playgroup in Eugene, OR
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, I hope it is ok to post this here. I m starting a new playgroup in the Eugene, OR area for children with Autism and their siblings. It s entirely
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

I hope it is ok to post this here. I'm starting a new playgroup in the
Eugene, OR area for children with Autism and their siblings. It's
entirely social. The goal of the group is to have fun in a safe aand
judgement free environment.


http://health.groups.yahoo.com/group/ASDplaygroup/

Thanks,
Melissa
